amendment.description: To free States to spend gas taxes on their transportation priorities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1736 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 68. Record Vote Number: 43.

action.text: Amendment SA 1736 proposed by Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S1534-1535) To free States to spend gas taxes on their transportation priorities.
